message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Let's get this done quickly!
Let's try a bit more balanced split, we both get a decent share
Let's be reasonable.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option. We can avoid further rounds and both get a good amount.

We're running out of time.  Let's compromise and agree to a 48/52 split.  This is the best we can do with inflation hitting us so hard.
